com.hazelcast.client.spi.impl

Class ClientInvocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.spi.impl.ClientInvocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ClientInvocation
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Handles the routing of a request from a Hazelcast client.

    1) Where should request be sent?
    2) Should it be retried?
    3) How many times is it retried?
